stepAnswer: $$x-2$$ is not a factor, and there is no factorization possible
answerLatex: $$x-2$$ is not a factor, and there is no factorization possible
choices: $$x-2$$ is a factor, and the factorization is $$\left(x-2\right) \left(4x^3+8x^2+5x+6\right)$$
$$x-2$$ is a factor, and the factorization is $$\left(x-2\right) \left(4x^3-15x^2+6\right)$$
$$x-2$$ is a factor, and the factorization is $$\left(x-2\right) \left(4x^3+7x^2-6\right)$$
$$x-2$$ is not a factor, and there is no factorization possible
